title: New: Brolin – Another Year
content:
So chances are he’ll end up soundtracking 2013’s John Lewis Christmas advert, but hey, not every act who features on those adverts ends up sucking from the teet of capitalist robots… or whatever it is I’m supposed to say.

Bedroom producer Brolin has all the makings of the next success story a la James Blake, Youth Lagoon etc. with the appealing intimacy of new track Another Year not quite matching the stunning beauty of his earlier work, but certainly showcasing the talent this guy has. Check out Another Year below, and grab a free download whilst you can.
